name: enzyme-to-json
description: convert enzyme wrapper to a format compatible with Jest snapshot

scripts.build: babel src -d build && babel src/serializer.js -o serializer.js
scripts.lint: eslint src tests/core tests/serializer/tests && npm run format-check
scripts.format: prettier src/**/*.js tests/core/*.js tests/core/**/*.js tests/serializer/tests/*.js tests/serializer/tests/**/*.js --write --single-quote --trailing-comma all --no-bracket-spacing
scripts.format-check: prettier-check src/**/*.js tests/core/*.js tests/core/**/*.js tests/serializer/tests/*.js tests/serializer/tests/**/*.js --write --single-quote --trailing-comma all --no-bracket-spacing
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-core && npm run test-serializer
scripts.test-serializer: cd tests/serializer && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm test

author: Adrien Antoine <adriantoine@gmail.com> (http://adriantoine.com)
